name: The Spooky Forest
description:
[This Game was made for UoC Game Jam 2021]

~ Made in 5 Hours and 43 Minutes ~

===============================

The Spooky Forest is a simple game where you avoid getting hurt by enemies and heal yourself with potions as you run through a dark forest.

===============================

Credits & Acknowledgements:
